file_content.text: Excellent work, my dauntless friends! I will ensure all the Mountain's explosives are recovered from your spaceport and dismantled.
Excellent work, my powerful friend! I will ensure all the Mountain's explosives are recovered from your spaceport and dismantled.
I am aware of what those Nikto filth revealed to you. They never found all my surveillance devices after they drove me out.
So... you know I was once leader of the Kintan Kings. What will you do with this knowledge?
This information must be revealed to Ambassador Averdon.
Inform the Republic.
Do not be so hasty to shatter the young diplomat's illusions.
The Republic does not form alliances with gangsters, Bareesh.
Uphold the good.
What if I were no longer a gangster?
You're a lying criminal and a traitor--case closed.
Alert my superiors.
I am no traitor to the Republic's cause, I assure you.
People need to know you're nothing but a big fat gangster.
Shout it from the rooftops.
Damaging my reputation is not in the Republic's best interests.
It's none of my business.
You have a talent for appearing ignorant, but it is important we reach an understanding.
Everything depends on what you're prepared to pay.
What is my silence worth?
I will reward your silence--but you should know everything before we agree on the price.
When I lost control of the Kintan Kings and came to the Promenade, I discovered the greatest profits come from legitimate enterprises.
I am done with crime. Let me aid the Republic's cause. Your people make excellent business partners--much better than the Empire.
You're still only motivated by greed, Bareesh.
This is all about money.
Not completely! There's something satisfying about legitimacy.
Why should I believe you?
Without my help, the Republic's mission will fail. Do you want Nar Shaddaa in the Empire's hands?
In my experience, crime pays better than any legitimate business.
Only a fool gives up crime.
Do you know how much overhead it takes to run a criminal empire? It's ludicrous.
If Ambassador Averdon learns of my past indiscretions, I fear it will doom our flourishing alliance.
Let us leave the past in the past. I will pay you generously to keep my secret safe.
You can't buy your way to respectability. You have to earn it.
The truth must come out.
Blast you! Have you no sense of the greater good?
If the truth must come out, I will be the one to reveal it.
Ambassador Averdon and I will see you on the Promenade.
I've already forgotten what we were talking about, Bareesh.
Works for me. [Take bribe]
Good--then the matter is settled.
Ambassador Averdon will want to congratulate you for your success.
Come to the Promenade for your reward.
[This switch has been deactivated.]
